extension.name: org.apache.nifi.processors.network.ParseNetflowv5
extension.description: Parses netflowv5 byte ingest and add to NiFi flowfile as attributes or JSON content.

property.name: FIELDS_DESTINATION
property.description: Indicates whether the results of the parser are written to the FlowFile content or a FlowFile attribute; if using flowfile-attribute, fields will be populated as attributes. If set to flowfile-content, the netflowv5 field will be converted into a flat JSON object.

allowableValue.description: Parsed data routes as flowfile JSON content
Parsed data routes as flowfile attributes

relationship.name: failure
relationship.description: Any FlowFile that could not be parsed as a netflowv5 message will be transferred to this Relationship without any attributes being added

relationship.name: success
relationship.description: Any FlowFile that is successfully parsed as a netflowv5 data will be transferred to this Relationship.

readsAttribute.name: udp.port
readsAttribute.description: Optionally read if packets are received from UDP datagrams.

writesAttribute.name: netflowv5.header.*
writesAttribute.description: The key and value generated by the parsing of the header fields.

writesAttribute.name: netflowv5.record.*
writesAttribute.description: The key and value generated by the parsing of the record fields.

extension.name: org.apache.nifi.processors.network.pcap.SplitPCAP
extension.description: Splits one pcap file into multiple pcap files based on a maximum size.

property.name: PCAP Max Size
property.description: Maximum size of each output PCAP file. PCAP packets larger than the configured size result in routing FlowFiles to the failure relationship.

relationship.name: failure
relationship.description: If a FlowFile cannot be transformed from the configured input format to the configured output format, the unchanged FlowFile will be routed to this relationship.

relationship.name: original
relationship.description: The original FlowFile that was split into segments. If the FlowFile fails processing, nothing will be sent to this relationship

relationship.name: split
relationship.description: The individual PCAP 'segments' of the original PCAP FlowFile will be routed to this relationship.

writesAttribute.name: error.reason
writesAttribute.description: The reason the FlowFile was sent to the failure relationship.

writesAttribute.name: fragment.identifier
writesAttribute.description: All split PCAP FlowFiles produced from the same parent PCAP FlowFile will have the same randomly generated UUID added for this attribute

writesAttribute.name: fragment.index
writesAttribute.description: A one-up number that indicates the ordering of the split PCAP FlowFiles that were created from a single parent PCAP FlowFile

writesAttribute.name: fragment.count
writesAttribute.description: The number of split PCAP FlowFiles generated from the parent PCAP FlowFile

writesAttribute.name: segment.original.filename
writesAttribute.description: The filename of the parent PCAP FlowFile
